nodes.name: withdrawAsset
approveMakerAssetProxy
withdrawAsset
approveMakerAssetProxy

approveMakerAssetProxy(bytes).details: Approves the respective proxy for a given asset to transfer tokens on the Forwarder contract's behalf.      This is necessary because an order fee denominated in the maker asset (i.e. a percentage fee) is sent by the      Forwarder contract to the fee recipient.      This method needs to be called before forwarding orders of a maker asset that hasn't      previously been approved.

params.assetData: Byte array encoded for the respective asset proxy.

withdrawAsset(bytes,uint256).details: Withdraws assets from this contract. The contract requires a ZRX balance in order to      function optimally, and this function allows the ZRX to be withdrawn by owner. It may also be      used to withdraw assets that were accidentally sent to this contract.

params.amount: Amount of ERC20 token to withdraw.
params.assetData: Byte array encoded for the respective asset proxy.
